title: Why does search bar crash when pasting Japanese from clipboard?
content:
When I copy paste Japanese into the search bar it crashes. I've attempted support with Google chat several times. Here are steps I've taken so far that didn't work. 

- uninstall updates, reinstall them
- uninstall Google Japanese keyboard, reinstall
- force stop, disable Google, re-enable Google
- reboot to safe mode
- clear cache 
- opted out of beta, revert to regular Google 

When I select the search bar widget from home screen, it opens Google search, and then I paste Japanese from the clipboard, but the Google search app freezes then crashes. No haptic feedback followed by "paste/paste as plain text menu", the  cursor disappears, and the screen closes. 

Thank you
